body:
Thanks to Netflix, we're excited to check out the **F1 2021** odds and place some bets.

We've loved F1 betting for a decade but it's so hard to bet futures when the odds are so short.

Season 2021 isn't any different. 

Mercedes vs Red Bull or Lewis vs Max. 

- - -

## **Australian Open Mens Picks**

Often we try to find value outside of Novak (that hasn't worked out too well). 

Medvedev at 100-1 last year. Tsitsipas at 66-1 the year before.

We'll be betting around Novak again. And our man Ace is probably doing the same.

There's whispers that the Australian quarantine requirement will deter the Djoker from bringing his team out.

Medvedov and Thiem are the most logical options. Happy to take on the Djoker and Nadal in the futures market. Plus the champion old boy, Fed Express.

So stay tuned for specific bets on Thiem, Medvedov and any other big roughies that stand out.

- - -

- - -

## **Australian Open Womens Picks**

We love the Ladies. 

Our all time best futures ticket was JeÄ¼ena Ostapenko at 200-1!

But we've had plenty of near misses at the Aussie Open.

This year, we'll share our favorite futures in January, so stay tuned.

- - -
